column3: Grand Challenge - Do what is best for humanity; not religion, not political party, nor what will get "me" re-elected.
National broadband high speed Internet. Higher speeds for less cost across America.
Best bandwidth on the planet should be the USA's next Grand Challenge!  It will help Business and Education!
change food production so that nutritious and delicious food is cheaper than the processed junk available today
End the wars on drugs, in Iraq and Afghanistan. Bring the troops home and reduce defense spending by 50%
